references.reason: This paper introduces the Translation Equivariant Transformer Neural Process (TE-TNP), a novel architecture that is central to the current work's approach to approximately equivariant neural processes.
This paper introduces Conditional Neural Processes (CNPs), a foundational model for the neural processes used in the current work.
This paper introduces Neural Processes (NPs), a family of meta-learning models that form the basis of the approximately equivariant models developed in the current work.
This paper introduces group equivariant convolutional neural networks, which are used in the approximately equivariant architectures presented in this paper.
This paper introduces Group Equivariant Conditional Neural Processes (EquivCNPS), which are used as a base model for the approximately equivariant neural processes.
